name: Eloncoin
description: Eloncoin (ELON) is a memecoin inspired by the legendary Elon Musk, blending meme culture with crypto hype. Built on Ethereum, it dreams of being an "intergalactic currency" for space pioneers. With a nod to Dogecoin, Eloncoin's community aims for Mars, driven by Elon Musk's playful humor. In the cosmic battle for influence, one truth reigns: Who controls the memes, controls the Universe.
